user_profile: User 3479 is a male adult in his late 20s to early 30s who values home improvement and DIY projects. His visits to Chipotle suggest a fondness for fast casual dining and perhaps a busy lifestyle where convenience is essential. User 3479 is likely to be conscientious and organized, as seen in thorough planning for projects, and he appears emotionally stable, managing stress well in his routines. Future check-ins may include visits to other home improvement stores, local eateries, or potential destinations for home renovations and culinary explorations.
